header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN JOINT COMMITTEE ON CONSOLIDATION BILLS

text.quote: 000: Schedule 4, page 91, line 20, leave out “In subsection (1)” and insert “Subsection (1) applies as if”
000: Schedule 4, page 91, line 22, leave out “In subsection (4)(b) (condition C),” and insert “Subsection (4)(b) (condition C) applies as if”
000: Schedule 4, page 91, line 24, at beginning insert “The section applies as if”
000: Schedule 4, page 91, line 30, at beginning insert “The section applies as if”
000: Schedule 4, page 94, line 10, leave out “1965” and insert “1893”
000: Schedule 4, page 94, line 16, leave out “1965” and insert “1893”

000: Schedule 4, page 95, line 3, leave out from “for” to end of line 5 and insert “the words from “registered or” to “1965 or” substitute “that is a registered society within the meaning of the Co-operative and Community Benefit Societies Act 2014, or is a society registered or deemed to be registered under””
000: Schedule 4, page 95, line 39, leave out “1995” and insert “1965”
000: Schedule 4, page 98, line 7, after “society” insert “within the meaning of the Co-operative and Community Benefit Societies Act 2014”
000: Schedule 4, page 98, line 9, after “society” insert “within the meaning of the Co-operative and Community Benefit Societies Act 2014”
000: Schedule 4, page 98, line 20, after second “society” insert “within the meaning of the Co-operative and Community Benefit Societies Act 2014”
000: Schedule 4, page 101, line 5, at end insert “(for “year of account” see sections 77 and 78 of that Act).”
000: Schedule 4, page 103, line 15, leave out paragraph 81 and insert—
“81 (1) Paragraph 2(1)(a) of Schedule 9 to the Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (regulated sector and supervisory authorities) is amended as follows.

(2) For “section 6 of the Industrial and Provident Societies Act 1965 (maximum shareholding in society)” substitute “section 24 of the Co-operative and Community Benefit Societies Act 2014 (maximum interest in a society’s withdrawable shares)”.
(3) For “section 7(3) of that Act (carrying on of banking by societies)” substitute “section 67(2) of that Act (registered society with withdrawable share capital not to carry on banking etc)”.
(4) For “a society registered under that Act” substitute “a registered society within the meaning of that Act”.”
000: Schedule 4, page 110, line 23, at end insert “(for “year of account” see sections 77 and 78 of that Act).””
000: Schedule 4, page 110, line 26, leave out “(2)” and insert “(3)”
000: Schedule 4, page 110, line 29, leave out “(3)” and insert “(4)”
000: Schedule 4, page 113, line 32, leave out from “substitute” to end of line 33 and insert “the Co-operative and Community Benefit Societies Act 2014 (see sections 77 and 78 of that Act);”.”
000: Schedule 7, page 121, leave out line 11
000: Schedule 7, page 121, column 2, leave out line 20
000: Schedule 7, page 121, leave out lines 22 and 23
000: Schedule 7, page 121, line 27, column 2, leave out “185(3) and” and insert “185(2) to”
000: Schedule 7, page 121, line 27, at end insert—
000: Schedule 7, page 122, leave out lines 7 to 10
000: Schedule 7, page 122, leave out lines 15 to 18
000: Schedule 7, page 122, column 2, leave out line 19 and insert—
000: Schedule 7, page 122, column 2, leave out line 45 and insert—
000: Schedule 7, page 123, column 2, leave out line 7
000: Schedule 7, page 123, line 8, column 2, leave out “paragraph” and insert “paragraphs 1 and”
000: Schedule 7, page 123, line 17, column 2, leave out “10(1)” and insert “10”
